Product Description: JIO COCO–Tender Coconut Water
JIO COCO is the best choice and alternative to energize, hydrate, and recharge after a workout, hike, party or travel, to 
quench your thirst and boost-up your energy. Being an organic & natural drink that is procured from nature, JIO COCO
is the best alternative and replacement for sodas, sports-drinks, artificially flavored juices and artificially flavored 'energy-draining
drinks'—an emerging and on-going trend in the market that is gaining momentum to consume natural, organic
and healthy energy drinks for a better life. JIO means Life!

We know our consumer's need to replace those artificially flavored sugary-drinks with JIO COCO—the right solution
for our consumer's needs for better health, better immunity and a bright and prosperous future. Replace that excessive
sugar intake by choosing JIO COCO. Invest in your health and improve your life, immunity, beauty, form and physique!

JIO COCO—Live, Drink, Energize, Thrive and Enjoy with JIO COCO!

Contents: Pure and Natural Coconut Water from Organic Tender Coconuts
